DataElement.preferredName: MRI Computed Tomography Mesothelioma Probability Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Magnetic Resonance Imaging Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide amazingly clear and detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders._A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide amazingly clear and detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders.

Concepts.definition: Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders.

Property.preferredName: Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.longName: Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
Concepts.definition: A prospective scoring system related to suspicion of malignancy, including mesothelioma, as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NCI-INC0521046 20C0106 new questions 9.16.20 mc

ValueDomain.preferredName: Computed Tomography Imaging Mesothelioma Probability Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 2B that indicates abnormalities with a low suspicion for malignancy-other neoplasm (specify) as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.definition: A score of 2B that indicates abnormalities with a low suspicion for malignancy-other neoplasm (specify) as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 2A that indicates abnormalities with a low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.definition: A score of 2A that indicates abnormalities with a low suspicion for malignancy-mesothelioma as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 1 that indicates abnormalities unrelated to malignancy as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.definition: A score of 1 that indicates abnormalities unrelated to malignancy as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 0 that indicates no abnormalities detected as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

Concepts.definition: A score of 0 that indicates no abnormalities detected as measured by all modalities of computed tomographic imaging.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
